Meta.title: Panda's Weapon Pack Mod
Meta.author: Now Happy Panda
Meta.description: Add various weapons from Elonaplus Long Sword: Fleure Axe: Chainsaw Sickle: Chainsickle, Bone Scythe, Scissors Mace: Star Hammer, Warhammer Staff: Whip, Shakujo Polearm: Lance, Drill Bow: Blade Bow Crossbow: Repeating bow, Ballista, Crossfire Gun: Sniper Rifle Throwing: Tomahawk, Sox, Kunai
